Service

Our Tax Services

Are you paying too much tax? Please do not wait till the tax return season. We will provide consultation to minimize your tax liability. Our services includes: Strategic Tax Planning, Benefit consulting, Tax Return Preparation, and Tax Audit Representation. We will meet with you and provide assistance tailor made for your situation. Initial consultation is free. Please take advantage of this and give us a call.

Service

Our Consulting Services

We provide system consulting services for a business that would like to install the most effective computerized accounting system that fits their operation.

When investing in a system, Return on investment (ROI) needs to be considered seriously. Considering an investment means to consider the following:

  • It fits the current operation
  • It will accommodate the future plan of the operation
  • It can be used by the current staff
  • Maintenance costs are reasonable
  • It will provide data that can be used strategically by the organization in a timely manner.

We come across situations quite often where the organization has invested in computer system, but cannot utilize the system or has to increase the administrative personnel because of the investment. This should not be the case and our consulting will take into consideration the ROI of the investment.

Service

Our Accounting Services

We provide bookkeeping and accounting system set up services. We are experts in QuickBooks, Peachtree, and have numerous experience in setting up computerized accounting system for businesses and consulting for a better use of the current system.

We also offer bookkeeping for retail businesses; providing you with efficient system using Microsoft Excel and remote computer access.
